channel.title: Szabolcs Szamado on Terence Dores Cruz - PhD Candidate
channel.description: Recent content in Szabolcs Szamado on Terence Dores Cruz - PhD Candidate

item.title: Honesty and dishonesty in gossip strategies: a fitness interdependence analysis
item.description: Theoretical paper outlining when gossiper should share honest versus dishonest information based on the interdependence structure in which gossip occurs and the marginal costs/benefits of gossip
